title: Prefetch builder
description: Generate a script used to prefetch resources for an application

resourceTypes.description: An object describing the resource types that should be prefetched.

crossorigin.description: Flag that sets crossorigin attribute on links. If true it will be set for all prefetched resources.

targetBuild.description: The target build where prefetch should be applied. Used for identifying the `outputPath` of the build. It will be mandatory in the next Major version.

production.description: Flag for creating a production (minified) version of the js file or a development one.
